entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the characters in the compartment. He is described as being about to answer back when Professor Lupin stirred.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the characters in the compartment. She is described as saying 'Ron, don't!' and approaching Professor Lupin cautiously.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as one of the characters in the compartment. He is described as stirring and then sleeping on.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is mentioned as a cat that has settled in an empty seat, looking at Ron's top pocket.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving food from the witch with the food cart.

entities.name: the plump witch
entities.description: The plump witch is mentioned as arriving at the compartment door with a food cart. She is described as handing Harry some food and saying 'Don't worry, dear'.

relationships.description: Crookshanks is looking at Ron's top pocket.
Hermione is approaching Professor Lupin cautiously.
Ron is concerned about Professor Lupin, suggesting that they should wake him up for food.
